oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SCLC Telegram
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Holloman, Frank; protests; Abernathy, Ralph; SCLC;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Telegram from the staff of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference proesting the jailing of Ralph David Abernathy and others.
